name: New
descr: Incident has been created and is waiting for assignment

name: Assigned
descr: Incident has been assigned to a support agent

name: In Process
descr: Incident is currently being worked on

name: Closed
descr: Incident has been closed after resolution

name: Open
descr: Incident is open and pending action

name: Escalated
descr: Incident has been escalated due to severity

name: In Progress
descr: Work on the incident is ongoing

name: Deferred
descr: Incident handling deferred to later time

name: Under Review
descr: Incident is being reviewed by senior team
